verses.verse: How <S%H3068>long,<s%> Yahweh? Will you <S%H7911>forget<s%> me <S%H5331>forever?<s%> How long will you <S%H5641>hide<s%> your face from <S%H6440>me?<s%>

How long shall I <S%H7896>take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> having <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> every <S%H3119>day?<s%> How long shall my <S%H341>enemy<s%> triumph over <S%H7311>me?<s%>
<S%H5027>Behold,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, my <S%H430>God.<s%> Give <S%H215>light<s%> to my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> lest I <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in <S%H4194>death;<s%>
Lest my <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "I have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against <S%H6862>him;<s%>" Lest my adversaries <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> when I <S%H4131>fall.<s%>
But I <S%H982>trust<s%> in your loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1523>rejoices<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because he has been good to <S%H1580>me.<s%>
